advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Shop at stunning luxury fashion stores, conquer the big city that lights up at night, and become a high powered fashion exec!

FABULOUS FEATURES 

-          SPOIL YOURSELF with stunning, high-end fashions and superb shopping
-          CLIMB TO THE TOP and go from style intern to high-powered fashion exec
-          ENJOY EXCLUSIVE ACCESS to stores and earn rewards for shopping
-          HIT THE CLUBS and mingle with charming and attractive men
-          GO ON DATES and explore the city’s hot spots

You’ve finally made it to the big city and nothing can stand in your way! 

Be a Modern Girl and live the lavish life of a hip, successful young woman in the big city.

Play now and please rate Modern Girl FIVE STARS if you enjoy it!
__________________________________________

Notes:
- Requires iOS 4.0+
- Compatible with iPhone 3GS or newer, iPod Touch 3rd Generation or newer (32 GB and 64 GB only), iPad 1 and 2
- This game will not work on iPhone 3rd Gen, iPod Touch 3rd Gen 8 GB and older devices.
- 3G or Wi-Fi access is required for In-App Purchasing
- This game requires an internet connection (WiFi or 3G) to play.

Payments FAQ:

Does Modern Girl allow in-game payments?
Modern Girl is a free-to-play game, but like many games in the App Store, there is the option of purchasing in-game items using real money. Turn off in-app purchases on your device if you’d like to disable this feature.
